description: We're celebrating dads with a free 12oz cup of coffee all day on Saturday! We'll have some fun coloring pages for all ages, too, so you can relax with a cup of joe and do some soothing coloring, to boot.
name: Coffee and Coloring for Dad

description:
Bring family and friends out to remove invasive weeds, opening space for tree seedlings and native wildflowers. The oak-hickory woods here overlook Argo Pond, and owls and hawks nest in the trees. Meet in the parking lot north of the Argo Canoe Livery, off Longshore Drive.
Please wear long pants and closed-toe shoes. All minors must present a completed release form, and should be accompanied by a guardian. Tools, snacks and know-how are provided. Free.
name: Argo Park Stewardship Workday

description:
Join the ARTBus on Saturday June 18 and don't miss the exclusive opportunity to feel firsthand the creative energy sweeping Detroit!

We will be heading to the Eastern Market neighborhood, which is rich with innovative and diverse art spaces. Our itinerary has been designed to showcase Detroit artists from emerging to established as well as strengthen the comradery amongst Art Center community members.

Limited seating - Reserve your spot soon.

**Members of the Ann Arbor Art Center receive a discounted price. To learn about our membership program please visit: https://goo.gl/oCflqB
-----------------------------------------------------------
 ARTBus Art in the Market generously sponsored by: Sarah Whitsett Real Estate
name: ARTBus: Art in the Market

name: Restaurant Week

description:
The Connoisseurs’ Legacy: The Collection of Nesta and Walter Spink celebrates gifts to the Museum from two accomplished scholars with eclectic interests, a keen appreciation of form, and a love of learning from objects. Nesta Spink, curator at UMMA from 1967 to 1979, is regarded as the preeminent authority on the lithographs of James McNeill Whistler. U-M professor emeritus Walter Spink is a world-renowned specialist on early Buddhist art and architecture in India. This selection of their gifts, exhibited together for the first time, provides insight into the minds of two connoisseurs with tastes that range far beyond their areas of specialization; highlights include exquisite Whistler prints that are rarely on display and a rich representation of South Asian folk art. The Connoisseurs’ Legacy also honors the Spinks’ long relationship with the Museum, their roles as teachers of future scholars and curators, and their commitment to public education.
Lead support for this exhibition is provided by the University of Michigan Office of the Provost. Additional generous support is provided by the University of Michigan Center for South Asian Studies.
name: The Connoisseurs’ Legacy: The Collection of Nesta and Walter Spink

description:
Jonathan Rudinger, RN LMT has been instrumental in developing the field of canine massage for people at home and PetMassageTM at the professional level since the mid-1990’s. PetMassage workshops draw students from all over the worlds.  Jonathan has authored several books and DVD’s and taught over 300 professional level canine massage workshops. 

Jonathan will bring a dog with him to do hands-on demonstration of massage techniques.
name: Learn the Art & Essence of Canine Massage w/Jonathan Rudinger RN LMT

description:
Literati is pleased to welcome Benjamin Landry as part of the Ann Arbor Book Festival's book crawl! Ben will read from his most recent collection, Burn Lyrics.

Benjamin Landry is a poet currently residing in Ohio with his wife, the fiction writer Sara Schaff. A graduate of the University of Michigan (MFA, 2013), Middlebury College’s Bread Loaf School of English (MA, 2006) and Brown University (BA with teaching certification, 2000), he has taught English and creative writing for over a decade, at secondary and college levels, in the United States, Colombia and China. He is the author of An Ocean Away, Particle and Wave, and Burn Lyrics.
name: Benjamin Landry

description:
Magical Mitten Productions Presents: YOOKiE ft DOGFINGAZ, Tek - Mazter and Krippleninja

>>>What is a Bassover Takeover?<<<
The Bassover Takeover is night filled with great music, beautiful artwork and friends new and old. We bring together some of the best names in modern bass music and pair that with local artists and vendors to create a truly immersive experience that satisfies all of your senses.  

$10 limited early bird (online)
$12 Presale and before 12am
$15 at the Door after 12am

Tickets can be bought online at:
http://www.brownpapertickets.com/event/2539753

--------------Doors at 8pm---------------

8:30-9:30
++Secrt Asian Mn++
https://soundcloud.com/secrt-asian-mn
SAM, the Secrt Asian Mn, is currently very unheard of. He’d like to keep it that way too. His dream is to effectively turn around the EDM Scene from the shadows. SAM also surrounds himself in the college party scenario, playing for those who aren’t comprehensive and those who are lost within themselves… Those who like the unique music, not the Top 40. Those who like hard hitting trap and deep house. 
SAM will stay anonymous. SAM will always live anonymous.

9:30-10:30
++Krippleninja++ 
https://soundcloud.com/krippleninja
I DJ , Make beats, Record, but mostly I make music I like 

10:30-11:30
++Tek - Mazter++
https://soundcloud.com/tek-mazter
Tek-Mazter is in the game for the love of the music and the process of creating it for other people's ears to enjoy. He never sticks to performing or creating just one genre, his mixes and tracks consist of anything from the heaviest Riddim Dubstep to Chill Trap. In his short career he has performed alongside DJ Starscream (Slipknot's DJ), has been local support for Truth, Eptic and AB The Thief, opened for Timeflies & Walk Off The Earth, DJ'd for D12's Bizarre and has played some legendary venues such as The Detroit Masonic Temple, St. Andrews Hall, Elektricity Nightclub and The Works Nightclub.

11:30-12:30
++DOGFINGAZ++
https://soundcloud.com/dogfingaz
Born and raised in the suburbs of Shelby Township, Michigan. DOGFINGAZ is a producer/DJ of many
different genres. His music carries an array of bass, melody and unique vocal manipulation. Unrestrained by
'genre', DOGFINGAZ transforms traditional styles and creates his own. He has a natural and original ear for
all things music. DOGFINGAZ has propelled himself into the music scene using social media to self-promote.
Ambitious and driven, he has made his mark and is here to stay.

12:30-2
++YOOKiE++
https://soundcloud.com/sex-sex-and-more-sex
The art within the artificial: instrumentation computed in utter harmony with the brains of those willing to lend themselves, their ears, and their youth to the ends of ecstasy. Bass presence hums through a melody that leaves a gathering bouncing to its pulse; a perfect synergy of careless consequence and pure energy. It all centers around a single name: "YOOKiE."


-------------Local Vendors-------------
ODRD Collective


-------- Live Art ------------------
TBA

If you are intereted in vending or doing live art email MagicalMittenProd@gmail.com or Message Chris Stewart on FB thank you
-One Love
name: Bassover Takeover: YOOKiE ft. Dogfingaz, Tek-Mazter & More
